about_the_game:
Tired of your ingredients looking normal? Here are some special, limited edition topping skins to spice up your pizza for any occasion!

Included Topping Skins:
  • Corn Blossoms
  • Embracing Shrimps
  • Pepperoni Hearts

**PLEASE NOTE: Once you purchase these skins, they are yours to permanently activate/ deactivate any time you'd like! Check Decorations > Topping Skins tab to access them any time.

If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.
